parameters.bodyParametersJson: ={{ JSON.stringify({ model: $json.model || 'qwen2.5vl:7b', prompt: $json.seoPrompt || 'Extract topic, keywords and hashtags from the content.', stream: false }) }}

parameters.functionCode: return [{ json: { provider: 'OpenAI', Topic: 'topic from OpenAI', Keywords: ['AI','n8n'], Hashtags: ['#OpenAI'], prompt_used: $json.seo_prompt } }];
return [{ json: { provider: 'Deepseek', Topic: 'topic from Deepseek', Keywords: ['AI','n8n'], Hashtags: ['#Deepseek'], prompt_used: $json.seo_prompt } }];

parameters.bodyParametersJson: ={{ JSON.stringify({ model: $json.model || 'qwen2.5vl:7b', prompt: $json.postPrompt || 'Generate a social media post.', stream: false }) }}

string.name: tokenDebug
string.value: ={{ $json.error ? 'Error: ' + $json.error.message + ' - Use USER token, not PAGE token!' : 'Success: Pages found' }}

parameters.functionCode: return [{ json: { ...$json, message: 'Post published to platforms' } }];
